system.description:
You can trace the surat of time and space, cutting it thrice in one strike, ripping time-space.

Spend 2 Beats to choose any two tiles within burst 3 of you. A rip appears in those tiles.

Whenever a fighter moves into the tile, you can choose to teleport them immediately, as long as they're Size 2 or lower.

1/Riff, when an ally is teleported by your rip, you heal them 1.
system.flavor: You summon lightning from your blade to rend space itself, creating portals. To Guro Sajawadu, this is the ultimate learning of this style. The battlefield becomes one space.
